description: This file defines Express routes related to candidates, including listing candidates, retrieving candidate details by ID, and matching candidates to jobs. It sets up endpoints with Swagger API documentation and delegates request handling to the `candidatesController`. It acts as the routing layer in the backend server.

methods.name: router.get('/candidates')
methods.description: Route to list candidates with optional query parameters.

methods.name: router.get('/candidates/:id')
methods.description: Route to get candidate details by ID.

methods.name: router.get('/candidates/match/:jobId')
methods.description: Route to get candidates matching a specific job ID.
